body.name: JMIERR Men's Cotton Linen Casual Stylish Button Down Shirt Long Sleeve Dress Shirts
features: Material: Our JMIERR fashion men's button down long sleeve dress shirts are made with high-quality cotton linen fabric, ensuring breathability, lightweight feel, and softness. The fabric is also skin-friendly, providing comfort throughout the day. It can be worn as a casual shirt or a dress shirt, offering versatility. Check out our real video demonstrating each color option of this men's linen shirt for your reference.

Features: These men's cotton linen shirts are solid in color and feature a button-down design. They are perfect for casual wear and can be worn as 3/4 sleeves or full sleeves, allowing for different styles.

Design: With a classic and stylish design, our men's shirts are suitable for casual business occasions. The slim fit and button-down style give you a clean and fashionable look, while the textured cotton linen fabric adds a touch of sophistication.

Pairing Options: You can pair this long sleeve button-down shirt with chinos or jeans for a casual daily look. It can also be matched with dress pants for a sharp and classy appearance. This versatile shirt is a must-have in every man's wardrobe and is suitable for office, business meetings, dates, nights out, clubs, weddings, the beach, travel, and casual daily wear. They make perfect gifts for your boyfriend, son, husband, or even yourself.
Package Content: Each order includes 1 men's shirt from JMIERR. Please refer to the JMIERR Size Chart before ordering, as the Amazon Size Chart may not be accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Colors, Great Fit, and Super Lightweight – Perfect for Summer Wear!
reviews.reviewText: I recently stumbled upon the buzz about linen on TikTok and decided to give it a try by purchasing JMIERR's Cotton Linen Casual Stylish Button Down Shirts. I got a few different colors, and I must say, I've become an instant fan of these shirts.Firstly, the fit is exactly what I was hoping for. They fit as expected, neither too tight nor too loose, and provide just the right amount of comfort for casual wear. The sizing guide is accurate, and I was pleased with how well they fit right out of the box.The lightweight feel of these shirts is incredible. They are perfect for summer weather, allowing the skin to breathe and keeping me cool throughout the day. The linen material adds a touch of luxury and feels gentle on the skin.What really caught my eye was the variety of beautiful colors. Each color has a rich and vibrant hue that adds to the stylish appearance of the shirts. They pair easily with different types of trousers, making them versatile for various occasions.The overall style of these shirts is modern and elegant. They're great for dressing up or down, depending on the situation. I've worn them to both casual gatherings and more formal events, and they've become a staple in my summer wardrobe.In conclusion, the JMIERR Men's Cotton Linen Casual Stylish Button Down Shirts are a fantastic addition to anyone's wardrobe, especially for those looking to embrace the comfort and style of linen. I really love them for the summer, and I'm sure others will appreciate them as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits Well, Unique for Sure
reviews.reviewText: Let me start with the fact that the shirt fits well, though the selves are a bit long. I fold them over so no big deal there. The material is comfortable and well stitched. The colors are not as vibrant as I expected, but they are still very good. As for the style, I think it is great! It definitely is not an every day work shirt, but for a night out on the Hollywood strip, it's a for sure YES!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little heavy
reviews.reviewText: The shirt is attractive but much heavier than a typical lightweight linen shirt. The red is a true red color. It’s just not a shirt to wear on a hot summer day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly nice and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical of this shirt at first, and when it arrived, it looked like it wouldn't smooth out like my cotton dress shirts. But after a quick tailor of the arms and a wash, it's become one of my favorite shirts. It fits great, it feels great, and it looks great. It doesn't flatten to a perfect smooth look, but it also isn't wrinkly (if that makes sense). It gives a professional look while also remaining a bit more casual. The material is also very comfortable. It fits very well too. I wear a pretty standard medium American T-shirt size, and this fits perfectly (US 40M). Don't mind my comment about the arm tailoring. There isn't a long sleeved shirt on the planet that fits my arms right out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unique looking shirt that is suitable for any occasions including business
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’10", 155 lbs. of normal built and size “M” is usually slightly loose for me (my suit size is 38R).The sizing chart indicates my size as size “S”, but I selected my usual size “M”.The size “M” in this shirt is perfect fit and still has some room for comfort.The sleeve length was in an ideal length (but I prefer to roll-up the sleeves).The fabric is 65% Polyester and 35% Cotton and feels very nice to the skin.This is very nice unique looking shirt that is suitable for any occasions including business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I now own 4
reviews.reviewText: Great shirt. The fabric is cool and lightweight because there is NO POLYESTER. Styling is perfect. I am 5'9" 170 lbs, 34 " waist. Amazon recommended a medium based on my previous orders but I had to return that because it was too tight around the shoulders and waist. I ordered a large and love the fit around the torso. The sleeves are too long but I don't mind because I roll them up anyways. The army green and sky blue are very nice. The grey blue looks amazing so I bought a second one because I wear it twice a week. My favorite shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality/accuracy of dye varies
reviews.reviewText: The color of the shirt is described as grey/blue. Using a color corrected and calibrated monitor (used for digital photo processing in my work), the product photo appears with higher value, less chroma and with a hue that is much more blue. Shirt is much lower in value, more saturated (hgher chroma) and has a hue (color) that is much more on the grey side. In lay terms, the shirt I received is much more dark grey/purple than the grey/blue as shown. That being said, the color is ok, just not what I expected.Of greater significance is that the dye is lighter where the shirt was folded for packaging. So even if the fold creases are taken care of after washing and steaming to get out most wrinkles (I did not wash to check as I am returning this shirt immediately), I suspect that the dye lines will remain. I expect slight wrinkling with a linen textured shirt, but also expect a relatively uniform color or dye throughout the fabric without light lines indicating where the shirt was folded when packaged/shipped. I suspect this will not be a problem with the very light colors, but in the ordered shade, it makes the shirt look very cheap and presents a messy, unkept look.Size was good and fit was vey slightly tapered to fit but with nice room for comfort. As I did not wash the shirt since I am returning it, I cannot speak to the color fastness of the dye from experience. However, I suspect that since the dye is already slightly lighter in the creases, I would be very careful to hand wash separately several times especially with any of the darker colors.
I've bought 3 of these now and my go to shirt. Smart light and accurate sizes
Nice shirt, comfortable to wear. It is not wrinkle free and needs to be ironed. Kind of a peasant look I guess. Good casual wear.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice shirts, but not sure it's linen.
reviews.reviewText: Decent shirt that looks/feels like a soft slubby cotton than 55% linen when new. When washed, can feel the linen content but doesn't have the wrinkled look. No wash instruction labels or makers name. Just a label, 55% linen 45% cotton. Fabric is medium light weight & softer than most linen blends. Construction quality & sewing is quite good. If they're real linen, time will tell.
Chemise correct, conforme à la description et aux photos. Mais la coupe pourrait être légèrement cintrée car ça rend pas super bien sur soit !
